title: When filling a text box like this I get a 1cm bar across my screen with a key symbol on the left !!!
content:
This is a vodafone smart ultra 6 phone.
I don't ask it to save any passwords.
This annoying 1 cm bar started obstructing my input screens a couple of weeks ago. It makes parts of Basecamp impossible to use.  Please reply to my email soon. Thank you.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
